title: New: Years & Years – King
body:
Rumoured winners of BBC Sound of 2015 (rumoured – as in, a BBC playlist mistakenly confirmed it) **Years & Years** are hitting  the ground running in 2015.

With a debut headline tour coming up in February / March, the Polydor signed trio have unleashed their next single, the triumphant _King_. Synth-pop at it’s very best, expect to hear this in clubs across the country, if not the world. Check it out below.
